00002 #define CACHE_STRATEGY_H
00003 
00004 #include <time.h>
00005 
00009 class CachePolicyLRU
00010 {
00011   time_t time_;
00012 public:
00013   CachePolicyLRU()
00014   {
00015     time_ = time(NULL);
00016   }
00017   
00018   int compare(const CachePolicyLRU& t)const
00019   {
00020     return time_ - t.time_;
00021   }
00022 
00023   void visit()
00024   {
00025     time_ = time(NULL);
00026   }
00027   
00028   
00029 friend ostream& operator << ( ostream& os, const CachePolicyLRU& inf)
00030   {
00031     os<<"time: "<<inf.time_<<endl;
00032     return os;
00033   }
00034 
00035 }
00036   ;
00037

00042 class CachePolicyLU//least used
00043 {
00044   uint64_t visit_count_;
00045   
00046 public:
00047   CachePolicyLU()
00048   {
00049     visit_count_ = 0;
00050   }
00051   
00052   int compare(const CachePolicyLU& t)const
00053   {
00054     return visit_count_ - t.visit_count_;
00055   }
00056 
00057   void visit()
00058   {
00059     visit_count_++;
00060   }
00061   
00062 friend ostream& operator << ( ostream& os, const CachePolicyLU& inf)
00063   {
00064     os<<"visited: "<<inf.visit_count_<<endl;
00065     return os;
00066   }
00067   
00068   
00069 }
00070   ;
00071 
00072 
00076 class CachePolicyLARU//least and rarest used
00077 {
00078   uint64_t visit_count_;
00079   time_t time_;
00080   
00081 public:
00082   CachePolicyLARU()
00083   {
00084     visit_count_ = 1;
00085     time_ = time(NULL);
00086   }
00087   
00088   int compare(const CachePolicyLARU& t)const
00089   {
00090     //cout<<time_<<" "<<t.time_<<"  "<<visit_count_<<"  "<<t.visit_count_<<endl;
00091     
00092     return (visit_count_+time_*1000) - (t.visit_count_ + t.time_*1000);
00093   }
00094 
00095   void visit()
00096   {
00097     time_ = time(NULL);
00098     visit_count_++;
00099   }
00100 
00101 friend ostream& operator << ( ostream& os, const CachePolicyLARU& inf)
00102   {
00103     os<<"time: "<<inf.time_<<"  visited: "<<inf.visit_count_<<endl;
00104     return os;
00105   }
00106   
00107   
00108 }
00109   ;
00110 #endif
